title: Law amending Law establishing the General Statute governing Public Servants
title_en: Law amending Law establishing the General Statute governing Public Servants

provisions.title: Article 2 - Drafting,
provisions.content: adoption of this Law consideration and This Law was drafted, considered and adopted Ikinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 3 - Commencement
provisions.content: LAW Nº 019/2020 OF 19/11/2020 AMENDING LAW N° 017/2020 07/10/2020 ESTABLISHING THE GENERAL STATUTE GOVERNING PUBLIC SERVANTS We, KAGAME Paul, President of the Republic; THE PARLIAMENT HAS ADOPTED AND WE SANCTION, PROMULGATE THE FOLLOWING LAW AND ORDER IT PUBLISHED IN THE OFFICIAL GAZETTE OF THE REPUBLIC OF RWANDA THE PARLIAMENT: The Chamber of Deputies, in its sitting of October 2020; Pursuant to the Constitution of the Republic Rwanda of 2003 revised in 2015, especially Articles 27, 30, 31, 32, 33, 64, 70, 88, 89, 90, 93, 106, 120, 122 and 176; Having reviewed Law n° 017/2020 of 07/10/2020 establishing the general statute governing Public servants; ADOPTS:

provisions.title: Article 1 - Maternity leave
provisions.content: In Law n° 017/2020 of 07/10/2020 establishing the general statute governing public servants,

provisions.title: Article 21 - bis is inserted to read as follows:
provisions.content: “Article 21 bis: Maternity leave A female public servant who gives birth has right to maternity leave of twelve (12) consecutive weeks including two (2) weeks may take before delivery. A female public servant who wishes to take maternity leave submits to the director of human resources a certificate of a recognized healthcare entity with a copy thereof to her immediate supervisor”.
